alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 6:02PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong wind gusts associated with a thunderstorm over northern Weld County will impact portions of south central Laramie County through 630 PM MDT... At 600 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rockport, or 11 miles south of Cheyenne, moving north at 15 mph. Strong wind gusts around 50 mph are expected well ahead of this thunderstorm. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cheyenne, South Greeley, Ranchettes, Frontier Park, Warren Af Base and Warren AFB around 630 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Fox Farm-College and South Greeley High. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 1 and 13. Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 354 and 377. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
